goals.active: Report to Vigil Keep for new orders.
goals.complete: The Vigil has received reports of citizens missing in the sewers beneath Lion's Arch. Forgal and I have been sent to investigate.
In investigating the sewers, Forgal and I discovered one of Zhaitan's scoutsâ€”inside the city of Lion's Arch. Now we're headed to Claw Island to warn the Lionguard.
